ygData.subject: Re: HELLO!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I say you should start off with a Halfling. WHy? 1: Halflings gain exp quickly, and don t have to leave their own homes for better hunts till
ygData.messageBody:
I say you should start off with a
Halfling.<br><br> WHy?<br><br>1: Halflings gain exp quickly, and
don't have to leave their own homes for better hunts
till lv.. um.. well past lv 7... (took me weeks to get
my half-elf to lv 5, my Halfling was to lv 5 in 2
days)<br><br>2: People are nice in Rivervale. Or at least, on the
Tunare server they're nice. <br><br>3: Halflings can
haul butt when need be! Though, their night vision
isn't much...<br><br> Well, the decision is up to you!
Have fun!<br><br> Gallah, lv 6 Half-Elven Druid of
Qeynos<br> Teppeny, lv 5 Halfling Druid of Rivervale
